,temp_creater.user_cn_name as temp_orders_order_info_creater_display ,temp_updater.user_cn_name as temp_orders_order_info_updater_display ,temp_belaidup.belaidup_prod_name as temp_orders_order_info_belaidup_display ,temp_order.order_code as temp_orders_order_info_order_code_display
